content.html: I will believe that @ElonMusk is bringing free speech to this site when he starts posting about sex worker solidarity and lobbies for repeal of FOSTA/SESTA. Sex workers and adult content creators -- not Nazis -- are the true canaries in the coal mine of free speech.
content.value:
I will believe that @ElonMusk is bringing free speech to this site when he starts posting about sex worker solidarity and lobbies for repeal of FOSTA/SESTA.

Sex workers and adult content creators -- not Nazis -- are the true canaries in the coal mine of free speech.
